metadata.title: CVE-2019-16227 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in py-lmdb 0.97. For certain values of mn_flags,mdb_cursor_set triggers a memcpy with an invalid write operation withinmdb_xcursor_init1. NOTE: this outcome occurs when accessing a data.mdb filesupplied by an attacker.

criterions.comment: py-lmdb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
